content: यत्र {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [यद्-त्रल्] {@--1@} Where, in which place, whither; सैव सा (द्यौः) चलति यत्र हि चित्तं <ls>N. 5. 57</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 7</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 1.">10.</ls> {@--2@} When; as in यत्र काले. {@--3@} Whereas, because, since, as. (यत्र यत्र means ‘wherever’; यत्र यत्र धूमस्तत्र तत्र वह्निः <ls>T. S.</ls>; यत्र तत्र in whatever place, everywhere; यत्रकुत्र or यत्रक्वचन क्वापि {1} wheresoever, in whatever place. {2} whensoever, at whatever time. {3} whenever, as often as. {4} hither and thither).
